about_the_game:
Game introduction

"Hello World - Prologue" is a 2D platform,adventure and puzzle games. The player will play as a people who has strayed into the computer world, explore the computer world with the cursor sprite. During the exploration, you will have a series of interesting interactions with, garbage files, Word documents, PowerPoint documents, Excel documents, anti-virus software, blinking cursors while typing and even binary 0 and 1 in computer. Wish you a good journey!

Game presentation


I stumbled into the world of computers! ? This place is different than I expected......

Folder


I should be inside the folder, I must try to change the folder size to enter the Word document.

Word Document


I am in a Word document! Are they binary zeros and binary ones in the computer?

[Abstract] and [Key words]? It turns out that this is a thesis......

Excel Document


Excel Document？It looks very interesting!

This is not an ordinary Breakout Game......

I'm sweating like a pig......

PowerPoint Document


Here is the PowerPoint document, familiar animation!

I've seen this before...... Let me think......

I turned into a binary 0...... How can Iget out of here......

name: Hello World Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: You have strayed into the world of computer! ? During the exploration, you will have a series of interesting interactions with folders, garbage files, Word documents, PowerPoint documents, Excel documents, anti-virus software, blinking cursors while typing and even binary 0 and 1 in computer!
